flawed_nl_solution:
1 week has 7 days so 2 weeks will have 2*7 = <<7*2=14>>14 days
The puppy will eat 1/4c three times a day so 0.25*3= <<0.25*3=0.75>>0.75 cups per day
The puppy will eat 0.75 cups of food a day for 14 days for a total of 0.75*14 =<<0.75*14=10.5>>10.5 cups
The puppy will then eat `.5 cup of food twice a day so 0.5*2 = <<0.5*2=1>>1 cup per day
The puppy will eat 1 cup of food a day for 14 days for a total of 1*14 = <<1*14=14>>14 cups per day
She has already fed him 0.5 cup of food and he will eat 10.5 cups and another 14 cups for a total of 0.5+10.5+14 = <<0.5+10.5+14=52>>52 cups of food
#### 52

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 52. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
